lead_paragraph: Belgium's Tom Goegebuer became the oldest competitor in Olympic weightlifting history when he finished 14th in the men’s 56kg at the Rio Games and is now looking forward to retirement and, most of all, a cold beer.

headline.print_headline: Weightlifting-Oldest Ever Games Lifter Slams Cheats and Calls Time
headline.main: Weightlifting-Oldest Ever Games Lifter Slams Cheats and Calls Time

snippet: Belgium's Tom Goegebuer became the oldest competitor in Olympic weightlifting history when he finished 14th in the men’s 56kg at the Rio Games and is now looking forward to retirement and, most of all, a cold beer....
